org.openadaptor.core
Interface IPollingReadConnector

All Superinterfaces:
IReadConnector
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPollingReadConnector, ThrottlingReadConnector
public interface IPollingReadConnector
extends IReadConnector

Interface for polling read connectors. A polling read connector will define an algorithm for polling external resources by the underlying read connector (delegate). The simplest behaviour might be for the underlying read connector to execute one call for data and exit, a more complex one might involve multimple calls with a specified time interval in between, with the interval perhaps different for when the previous call returned or did not return data.

Author:
Kris Lachor

Method Summary
 IReadConnector getDelegate()
          Returns the underlying read connector for which the polling strategy is defined.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.openadaptor.core.IReadConnector
connect, disconnect, getReaderContext, isDry, next, setReaderContext, validate
 

Method Detail

getDelegate

public IReadConnector getDelegate()
Returns the underlying read connector for which the polling strategy is defined. The underlying connector can either be a 'concrete' IReadConnector (jms, jdbc, file, ...) or another IPollingReadConnector.

Returns:
the underlying polling read connector.
